segments.text: I see the kitchen all lit up from the daytime window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on her dish, but the mess behind her is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing the sink, drenching everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is widening, so sloppy and unnecessary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, and she acts like it's not there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, the cookie jar is raided by the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's perched on that stool, making the whole scene even messier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies could spill everywhere if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for one just adds to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet cabinets are streaked, what a filthy sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean, unlike this disaster area inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless it all appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR
